ygData.subject: Re: Please help me :(
ygData.msgSnippet: Monsters levels are different from player levels in the game.  I am level 13 and can take a fire imp out on my own.  Depending on the imp, he can do some real
ygData.messageBody:
Monsters levels are different from player levels in the game. I am level
13 and can take a fire imp out on my own. Depending on the imp, he can do
some real harm to me... there are times I end up dying because one is
particularly strong.
There was an informative post on this recently, I will try to find the url
and send it on for everyone to check out. It is very interesting to see
what the developers said. It was within the last few days on one of the
major sites.. probably EQ Vault and it may not have been wizard specific (I
seem to remember something about necromancers being mentioned), but it
applies to everyone in the game.

Alaia, Dark Elf Wizzy, Veeshan





At 04:05 AM 5/8/99 +0200, you wrote:
>From: "Karl Hatteland" <karlh@...>
>
>That would be 6+, and my spells (Shock of ice) did 35dmg
>It was a man that almost was killed and he zone the imp had only little left
>I killed it with 3 shots each 35dmg then i got 1 and a half bar xp.
>
>Avari dark elf wiz lvl 9 fenin ro
>

> >>>>
> >>>>All true, but I would like to add one point, and that is Wizard spells
> >>will
> >>>>always be resisted if the mob is 6+ levels greater than the casters.
> >>>>
> >>>>Chris Trubiani wrote:
> >>>>
> >>>>> From: "Chris Trubiani" <u1607755@...>
> >>>>>
> >>>>> Hail... Wizard spells work a different way then other casters. The
> >>>other
> >>>>> casters (I'm not sure if magicians are included in this) either do
>full
> >>>dmg
> >>>>> or no dmg. Wizards have there dmg vary over a range. This may seem
> >>bad
> >>>to
> >>>>> you now, but it's not. Wizard spells get completely resisted less
>than
> >>>>> other caster spells. So when you're doing 40 dmg (on a 83 dmg spell),
> >>>but
> >>>>> everyone else is getting completely resisted you won't feel so
>useless.
> >>>>> BTW, Necro life draining spells are impossible to resist, it will do
> >the
> >>>>> same amount of dmg every single time he casts it no matter what.
> >>>>>
> >>>>> details.
